p: Data presented in Table 1 shows several plant species, frequently used for the treatment of various illnesses associated with skin and stomach diseases, respiratory tract infections, tuberculosis antipyretic, inflammations, anasarca, cancer, astringent, convulsions, cough, cramps, diarrhea, dysentery, headache, hypertension, snakebite, sores decreasing thirst, enhancing hunger monitor of adverse outcomes, medication safety, diuretic, alterative, antiperiodic and purgative.
